bjhong02 wrote:

>I disabled the user/developer manual generation as you suggested, and
>I think the following attainGoal should also be erased.
>
><postGoal name="dist:prepare-bin-filesystem">
>...
>    <attainGoal name="docbook"/>
>...
></postGoal> 
>  
>
Ok. Thanks.

>after that, building processs did not output XSLT Error. but failed in
>the following step.  This failure also occurs before the above updating.
>I can find the mp3.mp3 file in that directory, why can't be copied?
>  
>
Try running the build with '--debug' as an argument to maven as in 
'maven --debug dist' and see if it gives you more details on why the 
copy is failing (Can you do it manually between src and
tgt and have it succeed running as the user who is running the maven 
build?).  Are there failures earlier in the ant/maven output?
St.Ack
